context.title: ModeShape Server View
context.description: The ModeShape Server View shows all registered servers and their repositories and workspaces.

context.title: Server Dialog
context.description: The ModeShape Server Dialog allows you to edit or create a server that hosts one or more repositories.

context.title: ModeShape Publish and Unpublish Dialog Help
context.description: The Publish/Unpublish Dialog uploads or removes selected resources from the selected server.

context.title: Publishing Preferences Dialog Help
context.description: The Publishing Preferences Dialog allows you to identify file extensions and folder names that should not be involved in publishing operations.

context.title: Publishing Message Console
context.description: The ModeShape Publishing Message Console contains the output from the publishing and unpublishing operations.
